A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
If you want a well done space movie\, Last Jedi is a great way to spent a couple hours as a follow-up to Force Awakens.

If you want a Star Wars movie\, you could go in to it thinking it was The Asylum's knkckoff "Final Spacewizards" featuring Luka Skyrunner\, Princess Leia Duo\, Furbacca\, and an assortment of almost limable\, mostly disappointing characters. 

It tries really hard to be a real Star Wars movie\, but it lacks the magic\, and sits\, like pinnochio\, as a wooden imitation. 

Disney can't get out of its own way with the stories they're choosing to tell.
